item.description:
Join Imani Mamalution & Eden Love for the first in an ongoing series of classes, demos and lectures on how you can begin to integrate the lusciousness of the High Vibe Lifestyle into your daily routine. Inspiring talks, supportive environment, raw food demos, kitchen makeovers, full immersions & more! 

 

This evening kicks off our MamaLicious Juicy 10 Week Challenge! The Spring Equinox is the perfect time to cleanse. We invite you to give your body (the divine temple you inhabit) just one day off a week with a fresh, organic juice cleanse. To show our support we will gift you a free day of juicing if you sign up for our 9 week program - and we will throw in two complimentary infrared sauna sessions (one to kick off your journey & the other to celebrate your success). We will discuss the benefits of juicing, what juicer is the best for home use, our favorite juice recipes and tips on how to get the most of your veggies!

 

 

 

Investment: $15 (can be applied to any juicer purchase made in the month of March, April or May 2012!)
item.name: MamaLicious Juicing Basics with Imani
